programme.desc: Seorang pereka grafik yang baru menamatkan pengajian sedang mencari pekerjaan dalam ekonomi yang teruk ini, apabila dia bertemu seorang mekanik dan jatuh cinta dengannya.

programme.title: Missing You
programme.desc: Libby sering diganggu oleh roh sejak berpindah ke rumah baru. Dia fikir ibu tirinya, Karina, adalah punca, kerana dia mengoyakkan gambar ibu kandungnya.

programme.title: Sabarnya Istri Yang Terzolimi
programme.desc: Diana terkejut apabila orang ramai mencari suaminya dan menuntut tanggungjawab. Ternyata selama ini Dody (suaminya) mencari rezeki dengan melakukan penipuan.

programme.title: Variety Jom Wayang S12 Ep7
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep1
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Relationshit
programme.desc: Alitt, seorang pengarang terlaris, yang sentiasa disokong oleh teman wanitanya, Wina. Namun, hubungan mereka terjalin kerana Wina akur dengan permintaan ibunya. Sehingga akhirnya Alitt bertemu dengan Vivi.

programme.title: Jasmine
programme.desc: Gerak manja Jasmine menyayangi dirinya membuatkan hati Zaman berdetik mencintai Jasmine. Sayang telah bertukar menjadi cinta tanpa dipinta. Untuk itu, walaupun diusia 33 tahun, Zaman masih sendiri. Hati Zaman terguris kala Jasmine menyatakan cintanya pada lelaki lain. Awal segala-gala pada Jasmine kerana Awal cinta pertamanya.

programme.title: Cucu Atuk
programme.desc: Pak Zubir menjaga cucunya, Aiman yang menjadi yatim piatu apabila kedua ibu bapanya meninggal dunia akibat kemalangan. Bapa Aiman seorang usahawan berjaya dan telah mewasiatkan harta yang banyak kepada Aiman. Pak Ngah dan Mak Ngahnya berniat jahat untuk membolot harta tersebut. Niat mereka didorong apabila Juwita meminjam wang daripada Ah Long dan gagal melunaskan pinjaman.

programme.title: Tmo Cuti-Cuti Cinta
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Cuti-Cuti Cinta

programme.title: Jangan Pindahkan Makam Ayah Ibuku
programme.desc: Mengisahkan perjuangan dan penderitaan seorang anak yang mempertahankan makam ke dua orang tuanya.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep10
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Ibu Menuntunku Ke Surga
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Jaka dan Rani yang menyuruh orang untuk membakar rumah ibunya sendiri supaya mereka dapat menjual rumah itu selepas kebakaran.

programme.title: From London To Bali
programme.desc: Krisya yang telah jatuh cinta terhadap seorang jejaka bernama Irfan. Bagaimanapun cintanya ditolak kerana Irfan lebih tertarik kepada wanita `berisi`. Oleh itu, Krisya kini nekad untuk menaikkan badannya demi jejaka impiannya.

programme.title: Ibu Tanpa Surga Di Telapak Kakinya
programme.desc: Beberapa gadis muda yang cantik keluar dari bilik uji bakat. Jawatankuasa kelihatan memanggil nama gadis seterusnya untuk masuk ke bilik uji bakat. Apabila nama Vandra disebut, tiada bayangan Vandra kelihatan. Jawatankuasa itu keliru dan akhirnya memanggil peserta lain. Anggi muncul dari tandas dan kelam-kabut mencari anaknya, Vandra. Dia dilihat merayu kepada jawatankuasa itu supaya anaknya diberi peluang. Jawatankuasa menunggu selama satu jam lagi kerana uji bakat akan ditutup.

programme.title: Juara Indonesia Ramadan Ep9
programme.desc: Satu pertandingan kuiz di mana kanak-kanak menguji pengetahuan dan kecekapan mereka dalam menjawab soalan dengan cepat dan tepat, terutamanya yang berkaitan dengan bulan Ramadan.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep6
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: AKSI Indonesia Ep3
programme.desc: 24 Ustaz dan Ustazah dari pelbagai wilayah di Indonesia mengambil langkah untuk menang dengan melibatkan diri dalam pelbagai aktiviti Islamik yang menghiburkan dan bermakna. Saksikan dakwah mereka beraksi bersama para pengulas.

programme.title: Rindu Bukan Rindu Ep36
programme.desc: Rindu Bukan Rindu mengisahkan kisah seorang wanita bernama Rindu yang merasa bertuah memiliki seorang lelaki bernama Devan. Kedua-duanya tinggal di Jepun dan menghabiskan masa bersama. Devan sentiasa berada di dekat Rindu, melindungi dan mencintainya. Hubungan di antara mereka terasa sangat rapat dan sempurna. Tetapi suatu hari, Rindu melihat Devan memegang tangan seorang wanita lain. Apakah yang terjadi di antara mereka?

programme.title: Saat Taubat Meruntuhkan Keangkuhan
programme.desc: Danil yang pada mulanya bersikap angkuh dan bengis terhadap isterinya, hanya mampu meratapi nasibnya setelah menerima hukuman yang pedih untuknya. Sejak peristiwa itu, Danil berusaha untuk bertaubat dan mengatur hidupnya semula.

programme.title: Kalau Laundry Cinta Dikasih Info Mazseh
programme.desc: Sky meminati Mira tetapi terpaksa berbohong kepadanya tentang latar belakangnya. Dia tidak mahu Mira tahu ayahnya mahu merobohkan rumahnya untuk projek. Mira dan ibunya kecewa dengan Sky apabila mengetahui perkara itu. Sky tidak berputus asa. Dengan kegigihannya, dia berjaya mengejar Mira demi cintanya.

programme.title: Mas Driver Kasih Hati Tanpa Berpamitan Aku Rela

programme.title: The Man From Nowhere
programme.desc: A quiet pawnshop keeper with a violent past takes on a drug-and-organ trafficking ring in hopes of saving the child who is his only friend.

programme.title: A Little Princess
programme.desc: A woman's life takes a turn for the better when she meets her granddaughter for the first time.

programme.title: My Puppy
programme.desc: A groom-to-be sets off with his friend to finding a new owner for his puppy.

programme.title: The Night Owl
programme.desc: A blind acupuncturist, who strangely, is able to see normally at night, happens to witness the death of the crown prince.

programme.title: Cart
programme.desc: As a social critique, Cart tells a story of the employees of a retail supermarket band together when the contract workers are summarily laid off.

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: Secretly, Greatly
programme.desc: 3 North Korean spies who have been living and bonding in South Korea's community for years got the order to take their own life after a sudden power change in their government. What would they choose?

programme.title: My Perfect Roommate
programme.desc: Living with strangers becomes even more challenging when it comes to 70-year-old lady and young college boy.

programme.title: Seven Days
programme.desc: A lawyer with a 100% winning rate was threatened to defend and set a murderer free in 7 days to save her abducted daughter. The race against time begins...

programme.title: Lucky Chan-Sil
programme.desc: When a film producer suddenly loses her job, she moves into a bargain room in a rundown neighborhood where she meets an assortment of characters that inspire her in different ways.

programme.title: Villain & Widow
programme.desc: Widow Yeon-ju rents out the second floor of her home to a novelist. The neighbors suspect the novelists true identity as he spends an inordinate time whenever he's left home alone

programme.title: Pipeline
programme.desc: A team of experts were put together to drill into Koreas oil pipeline and steal petroleum, but the plan takes a turn as the group begin to deceive one another

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: Swing Kids
programme.desc: The story of a North Korean soldier who joined the tap dancing team "Swing Kids" in the Geoje prison camp during the Korean War.

programme.title: Memories Of The Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: Extreme Job
programme.desc: An ill-performed narcotics team takeover a fried chicken joint near the drug gang's safe house for around-the-clock surveillance. Yet their cooking talent turned the restaurant famous overnight...

programme.title: Single In Seoul
programme.desc: Yeong-Ho is a famous influencer who praises living a single life. Hyeon-Jin is an editor who is desperate about finding her partner. The two meets while working together for a book.

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: A music teacher was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Two Worlds
programme.desc: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 guardians. To reincarnate, he must pass 7 trials in 49 days to prove that he led an upright life while he was still living.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: An unstoppable string of mishaps awaits when greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: My Puppy
programme.desc: A groom-to-be sets off with his friend to finding a new owner for his puppy.

programme.title: The Dude In Me
programme.desc: After a high school student falls from the roof of a building and lands on a mafia boss, they awake to discover theyve switched bodies.

programme.title: Lovers Vanished
programme.desc: Falsely accused of killing his wife and sentenced to life, Soo-In escaped from the prison and fall in love with bar owner Mi-Ya. Yet their love seems destined to lead to heartbreak...

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep89
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep48254826

programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep43
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep918919
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep713
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep489
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep1516
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.title: She's a Man. He's a Woman.
programme.desc: This is a romantic comedy about a quarrelsome and loving couple whose spirits are being swapped over after a thunderstorm. The sexy lady finds herself carrying an ugly mans spirit, and vice versa. Can they switch their spirits back, or do they need to get use to the situation for the rest of their lives?

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about home and country is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the fathers forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the fighting spirit through generations.

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: Confinement
programme.desc: Si Ling, a pregnant painter, moves into her dream home after winning an award and hires a confinement nanny. As she begins her one-month confinement after giving birth to her daughter, inexplicable incidents start happening in the house, threatening both her and her baby

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: This movie is Wong Kar Wais most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses having an affair with each other.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: Push and Shove
programme.desc: A puppy gets gravely injured while defending them from the neighbor's large and aggressive Tibetan Mastiff. The arrogant owner of the Tibetan Mastiff, however, refuses to take responsibility, and the police aren't of much help since no people were hurt. When push comes to shove, the puppys owner vows to fight for justice for his dog.

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police hunts for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the Police recruits artist Lee Man to assist in solving the case.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Dailys Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: A second generation rich man squanders his parents money and calls himself Mr McDreamy. When his parents finally have enough and cut him off financially, he establishes a Mr McDreamy Training Academy using various unconventional means to transform his four recruits into Mr McDreamies with hilarious results.

programme.title: Reborn
programme.desc: Programmer and gamer Hao Ming gets approached by mercenary Fei Qiao and businessman Takeshi, and is drawn into a shady hacking game in Malaysia. The cyber mission quickly turns dangerous as Hao Ming must navigate the hidden motives and dealings of the mercenaries and figure out who's behind it all.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the polices only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face lifes mounting hardships.

programme.title: A Chinese Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Young demon hunter Yan loves the fox spirit Xiao Qian but has to rid her memories of him as a human cannot love a demon. Years later, Ning meets Xiao Qian and they fall in love. Yan advises Ning to give Xiao Qian up as she is now controlled by an evil Tree Demon but he refuses. As the Tree Demon seeks revenge, Xiao Qian also starts to remember Yan.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the Gang of Five in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Hell Hole
programme.desc: The movie features three horror stories in different era: a pregnant woman haunted by a ghost sacrifices her life to save her baby; a boy commits suicide after being bullied by four medical students and his spirit returns for revenge; some company staff are haunted after they open a box of used clothes, releasing a more than 20-year resentment.

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Touch of the Light
programme.desc: A blind but talented pianist Siang encounters an unrecognized but skilful dancer Chieh. Chieh is attracted to the courageous Siang while Siang is fascinated by the adventurous Chieh. Their friendship grows as Siang and Chieh pursue their dreams together. Sandrine Pinna was awarded Best Actress for her role as Chieh in the 2012 Taipei Film Festival.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: Dummy Mommy, without a Baby
programme.desc: Fong Lai Kuen works at an advertising agency but is about to be sacked by her boss after offending him. She pretends to be pregnant so that the company cannot fire her, according to the labour law. Since then, Fong receives much care and love from her colleagues and begins to feel guilty about her lie as things develop out of her expectations.

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: Xin Lan takes over her fathers MMA club which is heavily in debt due to poor business. After He Hua defeated Xin Lan, she replaces her to become the new top MMA Diva and challenges Xin Lans MMA club to a duel. As Xin Lan is injured, she seeks help from a retried MMA superstar to fight the battle on her behalf to reclaim the clubs and her honour.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Moscow Mission
programme.desc: Based on the 1993 true event of the "China-Russia Train Robbery", a gang of criminals commits a heist, stealing cash and goods from the cross border train. A Chinese police officer disguises as a businessman takes charge of the operation to arrest the criminals, but uncovers a bigger conspiracy instead

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a deadly bloodbath between the Hong Kong Police and Macau gangsters, Madam Fong, the surviving team member, leads a new squad of four policewomen across borders to pursue young anarchists terrorizing Macau in a mission to protect the Hong Kong Polices Deputy Chief Commissioner.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: Someday or One Day
programme.desc: The movie is a spin-off from the TV series of the same name. While Huang Yu Xuan mourns the death of her boyfriend, she receives a mysterious cassette player that allows her to travel back in time. She meets her boyfriend then again, but will she be able to change his destiny?

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: The Silent Swordsman
programme.desc: This is adapted from Louis Chas The Book and the Sword. A young swordsman is tasked to lead a patriotic secret society to fight the traitorous general who colludes with the enemy. At the same time, he encounters a female warrior and two beautiful princesses, and is caught between all their affections for him.

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: Call To Arms
programme.desc: The aggressive and dangerous Chin Empire conquers the hard-put Chao kingdom while the Wei empire is drained of its heroes and paralyzed by an indecisive ruler. Adventure, intrigue, death and tragedy reigns before the triumphant clash of the armies.

programme.title: A Taste Of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword. Assistant director Wang Po-yi also wrote this entertaining and exciting adventure which could have also been called "The Five Tigers" since there's no doubt that this quintet is the highlight of the action. Huang Tsung-shun is "Fierce Tiger," Hung Liu is "Drunk Tiger," Hsu Erh-niu is "Lame Tiger," award-winning actor Ku Feng is "One-eyed Tiger" and respected director/actor Wu Ma is "Sick Tiger" in a tangle of tussles and thrills.

programme.title: A Friend From Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the masters granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Changs farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: The Knight Of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his armys help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: Na Cha The Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend Investiture of the Gods, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: The Sword Stained With Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from Jin Yongs novel, the movie depicts the havoc breaking out in the martial arts world when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, a training manual, a treasure map and a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: Twelve Deadly Coins
programme.desc: When Qiao Miao is about to kill the bandit whom he just met, he is attracted by her beauty and they quickly fall in love. The two later discover the blood feud between the owner of the unique weapon - Twelve Deadly Coins and the old master who controls the bandit...

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yens property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld Kings sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: The Flying Guillotine
programme.desc: Ma Teng is an assassin of the Flying Guillotine Squad, a group of killers commissioned by the Emperor Yung. When Ma starts to question the morality of his missions, he finds himself becoming a fugitive hunted by his former comrades.

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: Return To The 36Th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of scaffolding kung fu.

programme.title: Spring Blossoms
programme.desc: Some of Shaw Brothers' biggest female stars of the 1970s share the screen in this tale of young love and interfering parents, starring Lily Li, Shu Pei Pei and Essie Lin Chia.

programme.title: The Secret Of The Dirk
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the City of Liu are forced to flee when the vicious Black Tigers gang raids their city, but are able to hide all their gold and treasures in a valley. A team of swordswomen led by Liu wants to get their hands on the treasures before the bandits, but both parties will have to contend with the wandering swordsman Chou for them...

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: Transformed from a young laboratory researcher, the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan must battle Princess Dragon Mom who wakes up from hibernation to conquer the earth with her army of mutant monsters.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Have Sword Will Travel
programme.desc: When the head of a manor loses his kung fu skills, he enlists his nephew and his fianc to help escort gold to the capital. The duo run into a mysterious knight along the way and they join hands to prevent bandits from stealing the gold.

programme.title: The Adulteress
programme.desc: The film is about the drugged, then disgraced wife of a peddler in the waning days of the Ching Dynasty. To make matters worse, shes soon framed for her husbands murder by her rapist, the son of the local magistrate! And even that is not the end of her woes in this emotional suspense

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Huis husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: The Water Margin
programme.desc: This is a martial arts epic directed by Chang Cheh. In the Sung Dynasty, the government is run by corrupt officials, so Sung Jiang gathers 108 outlaws at Mount Liang and establishes a band of patriotic heroes to end the repression of brutal overlords.

programme.title: The Pure And The Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fangs fianc and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him

programme.title: Heroes Shed No Tears
programme.desc: Kao Chien Fei is a young swordsman who wields a special sword with a teardrop marked on its blade. He is charged with averting an impending crisis in the martial arts world, but the villain, Zhou Tung Lai, wishes to become the ruler in the martial arts world, and launches a scheme to pit the various heroes against one another.

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: The Convict Killer
programme.desc: After spending fifteen years in prison on trumped-up charges for drug smuggling, the martial arts master Teng Piao embarks on a journey to take revenge on the person who sets him up - Black Leopard. Unfortunately for Piao, no one knows the real identity of Black Leopard, except that there is a black leopard tattoo on his chest.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.desc: Tamil Action, Romantic Movie, Starring, Megha Akash, Silambarasan, Catherine Tresa, Ramya Krishnan, Prabhu & Others

programme.desc: Tamil Sports Film, Starring, M. Sasikumar, P. Bharathiraja, Soori, Meenakshi Govindaraj, Murli Sharma & Others

programme.title: Road To The Well

programme.desc: End Game - Our ancient powers have endured for centuries but destruction is close at hand. What will cause their downfall? And who will create a lasting legacy?

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Silk Road Adventure S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Iran - Joanna continues her adventure following the ancient Silk Road across the Islamic Republic of Iran, home to one of the oldest civilizations on earth.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Uganda - Mountain Gorillas - With the preservation of their habitat and their conservation critically important, Uganda is one of the top countries in the world for viewing rare Mountain Gorillas in the wild, in a sustainable way.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1 - Sea of Serpents Ep1
programme.desc: Begin on Rathlin, where flightless guillemot chicks take a leap of faith and golden hares welcome the dawn. Head to Tory to see basking sharks, dolphins, and the endangered corncrakes dance of love. Then chase adorable Irish stoats across Achill.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Autumn Ep3
programme.desc: As fall sweeps across America and trees are set ablaze with color, animals are faced with make-or-break decisions. Find out how bald eagles, beavers, and other creatures prepare for the colder, darker, and leaner months ahead.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - A Busy Bay Ep3
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - The Elephant Dilemma Ep2
programme.desc: Theres a new arrival at the Elephant Transit Home: a sick elephant calf abandoned near a reserve, another victim in the battle for space between humans and elephants. Study the innovative efforts to end this conflict, led by Dr. Pruthu Fernando.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Penny, Chunk, and Faith Ep5
programme.desc: Visit Penny the pigeon and the human who saved her, get a buzz from a refugee who found comfort in beekeeping, and see celebrity groundhogs. Dive with a shark dancer and feel touched by the deep, lifelong commitment Riana has to Faith the cheetah.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Stork Pack in Trouble Ep3
programme.desc: Agonize over a lost Stork pack puppy, and tussle with Manzi pups who are sorting their place in the hierarchy, figuring out noisy-neighbor friends and foes. Hop on a search mission with Julz for the missing Kakuli pack in the desolate Badlands.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - Life and Death on the Plains Ep3
programme.desc: Liuwa Plains is a remote grassland and one of Africas last wild places. Only the toughest of Africas wildlife can survive here. Witness an extraordinary story of perseverance, adaptation, and survival in this extreme habitat.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - Augrabies Falls Ep3
programme.desc: Augrabies is where the mighty Orange River plunges over the awesome 56 meter Augrabies waterfall. Derived from a word oukurubes which means place of thunder in the indigenous language of the Nama-Khoi this land is the heart of a harsh and sun-beaten world with flashes of brilliant color and a thunderous roar.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Scent Detectives Ep5
programme.desc: A Labrador cross and its partner help prevent ecological disaster in Canada, a Lagotto Romagnolo unearths a rare delicacy in Washington forests, and a Belgian malinois team tracks down the critically endangered geometric tortoise to save the species.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Allies and Adversaries Ep2
programme.desc: Feel the love in the strange-but-heartwarming partnerships between some of Earths oddest creatures. Dive deep to see strange animals, from snapping shrimp to wolf eels, offer a hand to their fellow ocean-going weirdos to ensure mutual survival.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons 1 - Autumn Ep3
programme.desc: As fall sweeps across America and trees are set ablaze with color, animals are faced with make-or-break decisions. Find out how bald eagles, beavers, and other creatures prepare for the colder, darker, and leaner months ahead.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - Flight of the Pachyderms Ep3
programme.desc: The vets encounter a difficult predicament when a large elephant wanders off and ends up in a local village in an agitated state. If they cant find a helicopter to help with herding immediately, they will have to have the elephant shot.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Scent Detectives Ep5
programme.desc: A Labrador cross and its partner help prevent ecological disaster in Canada, a Lagotto Romagnolo unearths a rare delicacy in Washington forests, and a Belgian malinois team tracks down the critically endangered geometric tortoise to save the species.

programme.desc: Theres a new arrival at the Elephant Transit Home: a sick elephant calf abandoned near a reserve, another victim in the battle for space between humans and elephants. Study the innovative efforts to end this conflict, led by Dr. Pruthu Fernando.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Penny, Chunk, and Faith Ep5
programme.desc: Visit Penny the pigeon and the human who saved her, get a buzz from a refugee who found comfort in beekeeping, and see celebrity groundhogs. Dive with a shark dancer and feel touched by the deep, lifelong commitment Riana has to Faith the cheetah.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Big Cats, Big Trouble Ep4
programme.desc: Dodge a leopard with the Manzi dogs while they treat themselves to a stolen feast. No such luck for the Kakuli pack on the hunt, as theyre foiled by a brave puku antelope. Find the stork pack, and retreat from charging elephants with Jules and Simon.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - Stripes of Serima Ep4
programme.desc: The vets have Zebras on their minds. The endangered and beautiful Grevys zebras have to be isolated to bel breed. On the other side of the reserve, the more common zebras are destroying the cattles grazing land and have to be moved.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 - Ghosts of Cederberg Ep1
programme.desc: A rocky landscape, carved over eons by wind, water and fire, these are the Cederberg Mountains of South Africa. These imposing peaks are home to an incredible diversity of plants and animals. But there are some here that remain unseen, lurking in the shadows and ready to strike at any time...

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 - Namib: Land Of Extremes Ep2
programme.desc: The Namib Desert is a land of extremes, from icy ocean to baking sand. It takes toughness and adaptation to live in this desert, and only a special few can. From the sidewinding adder to the fog-collecting beetle, each animal has their tricks for survival in the Namib.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 - The Last Desert Giants Ep3
programme.desc: The Namib is the oldest desert in the world, hugging Africas shoreline for over 400 kilometers. It is one of the most inhospitable habitats on earth. Yet the worlds largest land mammal has made a home here, adapted through behavior and designed to life in the extreme.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 - Crowded Islands Ep4
programme.desc: On rocky islands off the coast of South Africa, thousands of creatures congregate to breed. Among these, huge colonies of cape gannets dominate. Surrounded by rich waters, they can find enough to feed themselves and their young. But life is full of challenges for the breeding gannets...

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Toto, Banksi, and Lucy Ep4
programme.desc: Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pigs rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Penny, Chunk, and Faith Ep5
programme.desc: Visit Penny the pigeon and the human who saved her, get a buzz from a refugee who found comfort in beekeeping, and see celebrity groundhogs. Dive with a shark dancer and feel touched by the deep, lifelong commitment Riana has to Faith the cheetah.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Jasper, Terry, and Gumbo Ep6
programme.desc: Embrace an invasive nutria whos become part of the family, paddle around with Gumbo the goose, and visit a blind hedgehog and his human chum. Explore a swimmers bond with wild gray seals and hang out with Cosima the monkey and Jasper the serval.

programme.title: In for the Kill
programme.desc: Marvel at the clever ways predators use cunning, agility, and breakneck speed when taking down prey. Witness luring behaviours and see how some killers hide in plain sight, while others put weaponry or chemical warfare to work to bring dinner home.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - Big Cats, Big Trouble Ep4
programme.desc: Dodge a leopard with the Manzi dogs while they treat themselves to a stolen feast. No such luck for the Kakuli pack on the hunt, as theyre foiled by a brave puku antelope. Find the stork pack, and retreat from charging elephants with Jules and Simon.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 2 - Return to the Wild Ep5
programme.desc: The Eastern Cape Province is investing heavily in ecotourism and conservation as an alternative to fishing and commercial development. The region is reclaiming farmlands and closing fishing grounds for wildlife. This is one of the most exciting conservation success stories in Africa.

programme.title: The Great Elephant Tale
programme.desc: Follow the adventures of three elephants across three very distinct African habitats. Their travels combine to tell the story of how these emotional and intelligent creatures evolved over millions of years to survive on the continent.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Usana the Cheetah Cub Ep3
programme.desc: Usana, a cheetah cub is born with the odds stacked against her. Few cheetah cubs make it through their first year. Lucky for her, shes got an amazing mother who will stop at nothing to keep her cubs safe. Usana might just follow in her footsteps.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Penny, Chunk, and Faith Ep5
programme.desc: Visit Penny the pigeon and the human who saved her, get a buzz from a refugee who found comfort in beekeeping, and see celebrity groundhogs. Dive with a shark dancer and feel touched by the deep, lifelong commitment Riana has to Faith the cheetah.

programme.title: Seasons of the Wild 1 - The Everglades: The Season of Drought Ep1
programme.desc: In Southern Florida, a unique and complex ecosystem known as the Everglades has entered its winter season. Predator and prey are forced to live in close proximity due to a limited supply of water.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - Stripes of Serima Ep4
programme.desc: The vets have Zebras on their minds. The endangered and beautiful Grevys zebras have to be isolated to bel breed. On the other side of the reserve, the more common zebras are destroying the cattles grazing land and have to be moved.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - The Lost Boy Ep5
programme.desc: Film a wild dog hunt with Julz as he catches up with the Manzi pack at a kill, and watch for leopards and hyenas as the Kakuli pack takes great risks while waiting for the rains to come. Go on an epic hunt with a returning male of the Stork Colony.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - The Enemies Within Ep5
programme.desc: Vet Batian is leaving Ol Pejeta after six years and he's organizing his team for one last action: a massive translocation of three speciesabout 500 animals. But when things go wrong, the staff is forced to come up with plan B.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Tidal Forest of Africa Ep1
programme.desc: We follow the South African mangrove forest and its residents through the change from high tide to low and back to high, meeting the red-claw mangrove crabs that keep the forest clean, helping it provide food and shelter for a variety of species.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - The Okavango: Lifeblood of the Kalahari Ep2
programme.desc: Take a look at one of Africas most abundant and diverse wildlife areas, the Okavango Delta. Investigate the way the delta functions and learn about the variety of interesting species that live in the area.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Urban Penguins Ep3
programme.desc: Living on the southwestern tip of Africa is an unusual colony of African penguins. Most African penguins prefer to breed on off-shore islands in the region, but human interference on their island homes has caused many birds to look elsewhere for suitable breeding sites.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa 1 - Precious Waters Ep4
programme.desc: Life in the savannas of Africa is ruled by water. And throughout the long dry season, life-giving rivers run dry and harsh drought conditions prevail, making waterholes crowded.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Baboon Lagoon Ep6
programme.desc: Enter the wilds of South Africa to get an intimate look into one of the continents most misunderstood primates. Like humans, these primates have unique personalities and share strong bonds with their families and friends.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - Search for the Secret Bear Ep1
programme.desc: The forests of Yala National Park are home to the enigmatic sloth bear. Shy by nature, this animal is seldom seen and rarely filmed. Join a team of wildlife filmmakers as they reveal this mysterious bears life and behaviour as never seen before.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - The Elephant Dilemma Ep2
programme.desc: Theres a new arrival at the Elephant Transit Home: a sick elephant calf abandoned near a reserve, another victim in the battle for space between humans and elephants. Study the innovative efforts to end this conflict, led by Dr. Pruthu Fernando.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - The Monkey Diaries Ep3
programme.desc: Hidden in the jungles of Sri Lanka is the toque macaque. Endemic to the island, these feisty group-living monkeys are found nowhere else on earth. And they are at the heart of the longest primate research project ever undertaken. Dr Wolfgang Dittus is on a quest to understand their complex society.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Battle for the Bay Ep5
programme.desc: Follow the Bay Familys matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Queen of the Bay Ep6
programme.desc: Chase Anna to the Townies lair, where Mia and her newborn pups are hiding out. See the babies first swimming lessons before the clan moves to new digs, and welcome an era of otter peace as the Mangrove Family becomes a parks main attraction.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 - The Lost Boy Ep5
programme.desc: Film a wild dog hunt with Julz as he catches up with the Manzi pack at a kill, and watch for leopards and hyenas as the Kakuli pack takes great risks while waiting for the rains to come. Go on an epic hunt with a returning male of the Stork Colony.

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - Arid Heart Ep1
programme.desc: From the vast, dry plains of the interior come some of Australias most recognized imagery, such as the monolithic red rock of Uluru and the bounding red kangaroo. But how did the arid center of the continent come to be?

programme.title: Over Australia 1 - The Great Divide Ep2
programme.desc: Created by titanic forces and spanning 3,700 km along the eastern edge of Australia, the Great Dividing Range separates two very different worlds. Aerial footage and intimate studies reveal how species survive and thrive in this mountain home.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Baboon Lagoon Ep6
programme.desc: Enter the wilds of South Africa to get an intimate look into one of the continents most misunderstood primates. Like humans, these primates have unique personalities and share strong bonds with their families and friends.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep16
programme.desc: The Case Of The Fable Forest Gold - The Pirates are searching for the long-lost Fable Forest Gold. If they can't find it they might have to stop being pirates for good! Noddy leaps into action to help them. Using all his investigating skills, asking who, what, where, when, why and how and with the help of the wwwbook Noddy follows the clues and finds the gold! Now the pirates can stay in Toyland and hunt for treasure forever! Hurrah for Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep16
programme.desc: Why Lizard Always Hides Under Rocks - You see there was a time when Lizard didn't hide under rocks. He would scamper around Tinga Tinga pinching other animals food and keeping it all for himself. Then one day the animals decide to give greedy Lizard a dose of his own medicine. When Lizard realizes the error of his ways he runs and hides under a rock too ashamed to show his face in Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep16
programme.desc: Nick Solves The Case - PC Pete has been summonsed to get to the bottom of some missing fuel. But where's Nick? And who can solve the case?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep16
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Lost Pigeon - The Thompson's family pigeon, Cedric, has been reported found in Northern Ireland. Pat must take Dorothy and Bill to help bring him back in the SDS Plane. Meanwhile Alf camps out at the sorting office, pining for his beloved Cedric's return. Once in Ireland, Pat meets the man who found Cedric and Dorothy manages to charm him down from his roof. Unfortunately an inopportune phone call from Alf startles cedric and causes him to take up a roost on a cliff face with a friendly puffin. With Alf causing chaos trying "help" Ben tidy up the Sorting office in Pencaster, Pat exercises his climbing skills to retrieve Cedric but it takes a brave abseil from Dorothy and Sean to finally lure the wayward bird back to its rightful owners.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep4
programme.desc: Where There's Smoke - After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep30
programme.desc: Wings - Ton-Ton's dreams come true when the Trux build hang-gliding wings to rescue the Ottos, but when he crashes it's up to Dozer to fly the rescue mission

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep30
programme.desc: Disappearing Act/Sting Of Justice - When a bad magic trick makes Chet disappear, Turbo and Burn work together to find him; A superhero hornet arrives in Turbotown and stirs up trouble.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep30
programme.desc: Chercophonie / Oh, Man, And The Sea - Tip becomes a Boovsland rock icon due to her awful guitar playing; When Donny takes Oh fishing, they battle a giant Sturgeon

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep45
programme.desc: Lucky and the Ray of Sunshine - The PALs agree to work on Grayson's ranch to get out of trouble, but he gets more help than he bargained for

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep46
programme.desc: Lucky and the Double-Dad Dare - Jim and Al set up a survival course for Lucky, Pru and Abigail, but when things go awry, the dads are the ones who need saving

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep11
programme.desc: Friday Night Liyotes - When Grug won't let her join his winning team, Eep forms her own underdog team in the first-ever sports competition Ahhh! Valley's annual Egg Toss.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep12
programme.desc: The Crood Who Knew Too Much / Scent Of A Thunk - When Thunk is so stinky he kills animals with his stench, he pretends to be a great hunter; A spider ant bite gives Grug the biggest brain in town.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep33
programme.desc: Escape From Krinkle's - Boss has an opportunity to get his old job back at Baby Corp;but to get the interview;hell need the playgroup babies to help him escape Marsha Krinkles super-safe Bubbeezee playroom. Tim nearly misses Kabob Day at school.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep35
programme.desc: Mega Fat - After Mega Fat is fired from Baby Corp;hes forced on the path of recovery towards being a Good Baby. However;Mega Fat is more interested in getting revenge on Boss Baby than finding the perfect family to adopt him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep34
programme.desc: Puppy Party! - Boss comes face to face with his old nemesis;Bug The Pug;after the playgroup parents decide to throw a Puppy Party. Staci creates a No-Paperworkist movement to avoid Buddy From HRs constant paperwork.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep6
programme.desc: The Lost City - With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep8
programme.desc: A Thread In The Dark - Klaus is injured and Verucas mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Verucas rekindled powers.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep7
programme.desc: The Last Guardian - In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimis not exactly who she says she is. Our villains alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep38
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shocking Showdown of the Staggering Sugamechangere - It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep37
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ludicrous Lunacy of the Loopy Laserlightmare - Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep30
programme.desc: Turn And Burn - Stoick, Hiccup and Snotlout search for Spitelout when he goes missing, and ultimately find him on a distant island battling a fiery Singetail dragon.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep4
programme.desc: Bad News Bergens / Unhealthy Competition - Poppy signs the Trolls up for a game of Bergenball with the toughest Bergen team aroundSmidge and Guy Diamond face off in a competition for juice dominance.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep30
programme.desc: O Brother Where Aren't Thou? - Mort becomes jealous when King Julien's wish for a little brother finally comes true after his parents adopt a socially awkward Aye-Aye named Brodney.
